Text.Text: Dr. Inker, Expert Anti-Abstinencer
Just a bit of champagne, rum, vodka, wine, and beer... and something unbelievable happens.
Jude Kellers-Wellington, Advocate of Green Futures
Jude must create a greener future, by force if necessary.
Papermaker
Survived the great droughts in Southern Enbesa by selling his water-free paper.

This itamae actually went through the training required to make proper oshi-sushi instead of faking it.
He knows the original recipes by heart.

Farmer Zheng
If one just sows the seeds a few "cun" closer together...
Has a near-photographic memory of the coastline.
Bamboo Forester
With some clever cultivation, bamboo can be made to grow faster.
Hunter Wang
Effortlessly weaves through the thick bamboo forest to hunt the local wildlife.
3-Job Worker Hana
Hana is the boss's favorite, she even works overtime while sleeping.
Rho Tian, Hatmaker in Quantity
With the sheer number of hats Rho makes, she confuses materials from time to time and has thus unwittingly started a few fashion trends.
Retired Firefighter
An expert in moving water from one place to another in quantity, he will ease any thirst with... ease.
Overly-Ambitious Policeman
With a keen eye on public order, he can be irritating with his adhesion to the book.
Major Mayor Jian
Won the last election with 99.7% of the votes.
Populist Opposition Candidate
Her election campaign was mostly "back to the roots."
Cheap instruments for the masses, they won't notice. Wait, this doesn't even look like a koto!

The Fisherman's Friend
The occasional pearl here and there, and all the sand dug up in the process, maybe he's just lucky?
Qi Connoisseur
While the up-in-coming medicinal industry sees illness as income, she embraces traditional medicine as true healing.
Increases storage capacity of Horaiese crops.
Good Weather
A large teapot makes brewing tea significantly easier.
Simply brew your tea at home, and it will never become cold on its overseas journey again!
A productive industrial loom that can manufacture cloth so quickly that there's free time to spin cotton as well.

Extra Residents from Street Grill
Extra Residents from Noodle Stand
Extra Residents from Steamer Stand
Extra Residents from Dessert Stand
Access to a Street Grill increases the number of residents in surrounding houses.
Access to a Noodle Stand increases the number of residents in surrounding houses.
Access to a Steamer Stand increases the number of residents in surrounding houses.
Acess to a Dessert Stand increases the number of residents in surrounding houses.
Treatise on the Importance of Hard Labor

Working a third job in the evening can work wonders for the family's honor. You might be longing for dishonorable virtues like sleep and eating, but a truly honorable worker will set these aside to support the economy.
Collection of Shí'èr lü Techniques
It's as easy as: Huáng Zhōng - Dà Lǚ - Tài Cù - Jiá Zhōng - Gū Xiǎn - Zhòng Lǚ - Ruí Bīn - Lín Zhōng - Yí Zé - Nán Lǚ - Wú Yì - Yìng Zhōng.
The Classic Doctrines of Zheng-Shui for Beginners
Chapters are in the order of the Circle of the Five Elements: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal and Water.
The Art of Balancing Mind and Body
A fight a day keeps the doctor away? Certainly not. Master Qu wrote this book for the dissolute youth, whose character has fallen out of balance with mind and body.
Thirty-Six Strategems for an Economical Diet of Today
Did you know you could get decent nutrition from fruits? Fish is something for Pescetarians.
On the Monstrous Nature of the So-Called 'Washing Machines'
Rumbling like the arrival of the qilin, the hellhound machines superficially designed to wash clothes are a secret Pyrphorian plot to replace the wives with dishonorable harlots.
Three Stratagems on the Necessity of Martial Law
A step-by-step guide on how to bring eternal peace, justice, and harmony to your new dynasty. Step 1: Unalive a lot of people.

If it's her word against that of the scientific process, people will take hers ten out of ten times. After all, you cannot trust the Western snake-oil sellers, and those ancient esoteric brews surely must heal you.
